data.title: Unseen pic of Big B with Vinod Khanna, Sunil Dutt, Nargis and other legends
data.meta_description: This picture of legendary stars in one frame brings back many good old memories.
data.text:
Mumbai: Amitabh Bachchan shared screen space with Waheeda Rehman, Raakhee, Vinod Khanna, Amrish Puri and Sunil Dutt in ‘Reshma aur Shera’. The film was a huge success when it released back in 1971.

It’s been long time since Sunil Dutt directorial released but this old picture of the film’s star cast will surely refresh your memories. This rare picture of Big B with the cast of his film ‘Reshma aur Shera’, we see the stars having lunch together in one room.

We also see, Sunil Dutt's wife Nargis, Waheeda Rehman's sister, who is sister sitting beside her and filmmaker Sukhdev next to Amrish Puri.

This picture of legendary stars in one frame brings back many good old memories. While we have lost few gems, their hard work and unforgettable films are still fresh in our hearts and memories.
